name: Bring your cat to work day
name_original: Bring your cat to work day
description:
The adventure of a little cat escaping an office.

This game was made in <10 day for the IGDB #001 and since I had school I haven't been able to work full time on this. But I am still really happy with the final product and hope you will enjoy the game as much as I enjoyed making it. 

Have fun !

PS: You should download the game rather than play it in browser because it will freeze if you lose focus of the current page.
